docs: Append response to feedback
SEAL v1: Client provides seal_hash from the original feedback

docs: Responder must be agent owner or agent wallet

docs: Agent account for authorization check and hash-chain update

docs: Core asset (for PDA derivation)

instructions.name: delete_metadata_pda
docs: Delete agent metadata PDA and recover rent (key_hash = SHA256(key)[0..16])

accounts.name: asset
docs: Core asset - verifies ownership

accounts.name: owner
docs: Owner must be the asset owner (verified in instruction)
Receives rent back when PDA is closed

docs: Enable ATOM for an agent (one-way)

accounts.name: asset
docs: Core asset for ownership verification

accounts.name: owner
docs: Agent owner (must match Core asset owner)

instructions.name: give_feedback
docs: Give feedback to an agent
SEAL v1: feedback_file_hash is optional (hash of external file),
the program computes seal_hash on-chain for trustless integrity.

accounts.name: atom_config
docs: AtomConfig PDA (owned by atom-engine)

accounts.name: atom_stats
docs: AtomStats PDA - OPTIONAL initialization
If uninitialized, feedback works without ATOM Engine

docs: Initialize the registry with root config and base collection

docs: Metaplex Core program

docs: Core asset (for PDA derivation)

accounts.name: mpl_core_program

docs: Agent owner (must be Core asset owner)

docs: Core asset - verifies ownership

docs: Sync agent owner from Core asset

docs: Transfer agent with automatic owner sync

docs: Core asset to transfer

accounts.name: mpl_core_program
docs: Metaplex Core program

errors.name: MetadataImmutable
errors.msg: Metadata is immutable and cannot be modified or deleted

errors.name: AtomStatsNotInitialized
errors.msg: ATOM stats not initialized - call initialize_atom_stats first

errors.name: AtomAlreadyEnabled
errors.msg: ATOM already enabled for this agent

errors.name: InvalidRentReceiver
errors.msg: Rent receiver must be agent owner

errors.name: KeyHashMismatch
errors.msg: Key hash does not match SHA256(key)

errors.name: KeyHashCollision
errors.msg: Key hash collision detected - stored key differs from provided key

errors.name: ReservedMetadataKey
errors.msg: Reserved metadata key - use dedicated instruction

errors.name: DeadlineTooFar
errors.msg: Deadline too far in the future (max 5 minutes)

errors.name: SelfFeedbackNotAllowed
errors.msg: Self-feedback is not allowed - agent owner cannot give feedback to their own agent

errors.name: SelfValidationNotAllowed
errors.msg: Self-validation is not allowed - agent owner cannot validate their own agent

errors.name: InvalidProgram
errors.msg: Invalid program ID for CPI call

errors.name: InvalidAtomStatsAccount
errors.msg: Invalid AtomStats account - must be correct PDA for this asset

types.name: AgentAccount
docs: Agent account (represents an AI agent identity)
Seeds: [b"agent", asset.key()]
EVM conformity: asset = unique identifier (no sequential agent_id)
Keeps nft_name to avoid extra Metaplex RPC calls

fields.name: collection
docs: Collection this agent belongs to (offset 8 - for filtering)

fields.name: owner
docs: Agent owner (cached from Core asset)

fields.name: asset
docs: Metaplex Core asset address (unique identifier)

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed

fields.name: atom_enabled
docs: ATOM Engine enabled (irreversible once set to true)

fields.name: agent_wallet
docs: Agent's operational wallet (set via Ed25519 signature verification)
None = no wallet set, Some = wallet address

fields.name: agent_uri
docs: Agent URI (IPFS/Arweave/HTTP link, max 250 bytes)

fields.name: nft_name
docs: NFT name (e.g., "Agent #123", max 32 bytes)
Kept to avoid extra RPC to Metaplex for display

types.name: AgentOwnerSynced
docs: Event emitted when agent owner is synced after transfer

types.name: AgentRegistered
docs: Event emitted when agent is registered
Field order: fixed-size first (Pubkey, bool), variable-size last (String)

types.name: AtomEnabled
docs: Event emitted when ATOM is enabled for an agent (one-way)

types.name: FeedbackRevoked
docs: Event emitted when feedback is revoked
SEAL v1: Uses seal_hash (on-chain computed) for identification.

fields.name: seal_hash
docs: SEAL v1: The seal_hash from the original feedback (for identification)

fields.name: atom_enabled
docs: Whether ATOM Engine was used for this revocation

fields.name: had_impact
docs: Enriched fields from revoke result (0 values if atom_enabled=false)

types.name: MetadataDeleted
docs: Event emitted when agent metadata is deleted

types.name: MetadataEntryPda
docs: Individual metadata entry stored as separate PDA
Seeds: [b"agent_meta", asset.key(), key_hash[0..16]]
key_hash is SHA256(key)[0..16] for collision resistance (2^128 space)
This replaces Vec<MetadataEntry> in AgentAccount for:
- Unlimited metadata entries per agent
- Ability to delete entries and recover rent
- Optional immutability for certification/audit use cases

fields.name: asset
docs: Asset this metadata belongs to (unique identifier)

fields.name: immutable
docs: If true, this metadata cannot be modified or deleted (static - fixed offset)

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed (static - fixed offset)

fields.name: metadata_key
docs: Metadata key (max 32 bytes)

fields.name: metadata_value
docs: Metadata value (max 250 bytes, arbitrary binary data)

types.name: MetadataSet
docs: Event emitted when agent metadata is set
Field order optimized for indexing: fixed-size fields first, variable-size (String/Vec) last

types.name: NewFeedback
docs: Event emitted when new feedback is given
Field order optimized for indexing: fixed-size fields first, variable-size (String) last
SEAL v1: feedback_file_hash is optional (hash of external file content),
seal_hash is computed on-chain from feedback parameters (trustless).

fields.name: feedback_file_hash
docs: SEAL v1: Optional hash of the feedback file content (ERC-8004 spec)
Client-provided, used for external file integrity verification.

fields.name: seal_hash
docs: SEAL v1: Hash computed on-chain from feedback parameters (trustless)
This is the authoritative content hash used in the hash-chain.

types.name: RegistryConfig
docs: Registry configuration for the base collection
Seeds: ["registry_config", collection.key()]

fields.name: collection
docs: Metaplex Core Collection address

fields.name: authority
docs: Protocol authority

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed

types.name: RegistryInitialized
docs: Event emitted when registry is initialized

types.name: ResponseAppended
docs: Event emitted when response is appended to feedback
SEAL v1: Uses seal_hash (on-chain computed) for feedback identification.

fields.name: seal_hash
docs: SEAL v1: The seal_hash from the original feedback (for identification)

types.name: RootConfig
docs: Root configuration - Global registry state
Seeds: ["root_config"]

fields.name: base_collection
docs: Base collection for agent registrations

fields.name: authority
docs: Protocol authority

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed

types.name: UriUpdated
docs: Event emitted when agent URI is updated
Field order optimized for indexing: fixed-size fields first, variable-size (String) last

types.name: WalletUpdated
docs: Event emitted when agent wallet is set or updated
